original_text: And I saw as the colour of amber, as the appearance of fire round about within it, from the appearance of his loins even upward, and from the appearance of his loins even downward, I saw as it were the appearance of fire, and it had brightness round about.
korean_text: 내가 보니 그 허리 위의 모양은 단 쇠 같아서 그 속과 주위가 불 같고 내가 보니 그 허리 아래의 모양도 불 같아서 사방으로 광채가 나며

sentences.original_text: And I saw as the colour of amber
as the appearance of fire round about within it
sentences.korean_translation: 그 안에서 둘러싼 불의 모양 같더라

sentences.original_text: from the appearance of his loins even upward
and from the appearance of his loins even downward
I saw as it were the appearance of fire
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 불의 모양 같은 것을 보았으니

sentences.original_text: and it had brightness round about
